## WorkerDeclaration.on() method

Listen to 'error' event.

This event is triggered when an error is throw.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(event: 'error', listener: (failedReason: Error) => void): this;
```

|  event | 'error' |  |
|  listener | (failedReason: Error) =&gt; void |  |
